mapper.sql: permissionId, permissionName, permissionCode, permissionType, parentId, isIndexDisplay, menuUrl, productCode, createTime, createUserId, lastModifyTime, lastModifyUserId, valid, menuIcon
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM tbPermissionInfo p INNER JOIN tbRolePermissionRelation rp ON rp.permissionId = p.permissionId INNER JOIN tbRoleInfo r ON r.roleId = rp.roleId INNER JOIN tbUserRoleRelation ur ON ur.roleId = r.roleId WHERE p.valid = 1 AND r.valid = 1 AND ur.userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by permissionId
mapper.insert: insert into tbpermissioninfo (permissionId, permissionName, permissionCode, permissionType, parentId, isIndexDisplay, menuUrl, productCode, createTime, createUserId, lastModifyTime, lastModifyUserId, valid, menuIcon) values (#{permissionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissiontype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isindexdisplay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{menuicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tbpermissioninfo
permissionName = #{permissionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permissionCode = #{permissioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permissionType = #{permissiontype,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isIndexDisplay = #{isindexdisplay,jdbcType=BIT},
menuUrl = #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productCode = #{productcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUserId = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyTime = #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifyUserId = #{lastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT},
menuIcon = #{menuicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where permissionId = #{permissionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
